department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Standing Offer for geotechnical engineering and material testing services for the Ontario Region.
description: Standing Offer for Geotechnical Engineering and Material Testing Services firms who are licensed, or eligible to be licensed, certified or otherwise authorized to provide a range of Geotechnical Engineering and Material Testing Services in the Ontario Region.
full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer: Geotechnical Engineering and Material Testing Services in Ontario Region

## Official Request Number
WS4332303816

## Amendment Number
7

## Publication Date
5 January 2024

## Tender Closing Date
21 February 2024, 14:00:00 EST

## Post-Submission Information
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting deadline and the Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documents and bid submissions must be received by 14:00:00 EST on the stipulated tender closing date.

## Service Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada invites licensed or eligible to be licensed, certified, or otherwise authorized firms to submit a standing offer for the provision of Geotechnical Engineering and Material Testing Services in Ontario Region.

## Expected Duration and Value
The forthcoming standing offers shall be valid for a period of three years. The estimated total value for these offers is $9,000,000.00 (inclusive of HST). The maximum value for individual call-ups is $1,500,000.00 (inclusive of HST).

## Technical Requirements
Contenders must be capable of delivering a comprehensive range of Geotechnical Engineering and Material Testing Services in the Ontario Region. 

## Selection Criteria
The evaluation process will assess the following factors: Technical Merit and Price.

## Trade Agreements
The Standing Offer is open to firms that can provide services that meet the requirements outlined under the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

## How to Participate
To submit an offer, please stay logged into your Ariba Discovery online system and submit your proposal by the stated deadline. More information and instructions are available on the official government website.

## Contact Information
For any inquiries or concerns, please contact:
Cho, Ma Im at (SPAC/PSPC) at [maim.cho@tpsgc-p
